handover.heading: Handover

before_handover.heading: Before you handover
before_handover.content: Check that you have: - reviewed the Person Escort Record and the information is up to date - confirmed the correct person is being moved - completed the correct level of search - communicated risk and health information with receiving officer

handover.not_fit_to_travel: If this person is not fit to travel you must cancel this move
handover.warning_text: Once you handover this person, you will no longer be able to update their Person Escort Record
